Common.Brochures.Common.BrochureName: The Heights on Austin Brochure- April 2021

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Heights on Austin will be Beedie Living’s newest development in Coquitlam’s Austin Heights neighbourhood. The development will feature two towers with 356 residential units (189 units in East Tower and 167 units in the West Tower) and a flagship 55,600 sf Safeway amongst an array of local businesses.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: JOIN SAFEWAY’S NEWEST LOWER MAINLAND LOCATION IN AUSTIN HEIGHTS
